name: NSImageCell
desc: An NSImageCell object displays a single image (encapsulated in an NSImage object) in a frame. This class provides methods for choosing the frame and for aligning and scaling the image to fit the frame.

items.name: var imageAlignment: NSImageAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the receiverâ€™s image relative to its frame.

items.name: var imageScaling: NSImageScaling
items.desc: The scaling mode used to fit the receiver's image into the frame.

items.name: var imageFrameStyle: NSImageView.FrameStyle
items.desc: The style of the frame that borders the image.

items.name: enum NSImageAlignment
items.desc: Constants used by imageAlignment that allow you to specify the location of the image in the frame.

items.name: enum NSImageView.FrameStyle
items.desc: Constants that allow you to specify the kind of frame bordering the image.
